text: Drobeta-Turnu Severin is the capital city of Mehedinți County, Romania. It is on the northern bank of the river Danube. In 2021, 79,865 people live in Drobeta-Turnu Severin. == References == Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Mehedinți County
title: Drobeta-Turnu Severin
